#cloud-config
apt_mirror: http://ubuntu.cs.utah.edu/ubuntu/
apt_sources:
  - source: "ppa:vbernat/haproxy-1.5" # HA Proxy Repo
package_update: true
users:
  - default
  - name: jira3216
    shell: /bin/bash
    gecos: Jiwan K. Rana
    groups: admin
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    lock-passwd: true
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jira3216@jira3216-server-1
packages:
   - avahi-daemon
   - python-pika
   - python-redis
   - python-pil
   - rabbitmq-server
   - python-pip
   - redis-server

runcmd:
   - echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://deb.openalpr.com/master/ openalpr main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/openalpr.list
   - apt-get update
   - apt-get install openalpr -y --force-yes
   - apt-get install haproxy -y --force-yes
   - apt-get install python-virtualenv -y --force-yes
   - apt-get install git -y --force-yes
   - apt-get install apache2-utils -y --force-yes #To install Apache Benchmark
